column1: #Text=I try to avoid altercation on any level , be it emotional , physical , or political .
#Text=But there are some wars I think that are necessary .
#Text=Twenty years from now we 'll have to figure that out .
#Text=I hope that we 've all learned something from it .
#Text=DS : What is your feeling toward the Iraq War now ?

#Text=We went in to get a job done , get Hussein out of there , liberate the Iraqi people as was dictated in the 1998 Liberation Act that Senator Lieberman helped draft and President Clinton put out there .
#Text=, Congress and the American people supported going in there .
#Text=I did support going in there , and even as an artist and a poet , and as a freak , I made a decision , that it was time to take this guy out .
#Text=I spoke with many Iraqi Americans who live in my neighborhood who also supported that .
#Text=Lebanese and Iranian friends I have supported it .
#Text=One of my childhood friends , Adel Nehme , came out of Beirut , Lebanon around 1972 .
#Text=We met in kindergarten and we 've been friends ever since .
#Text=He was someone who escaped that turmoil .
#Text=His family brought him to New Jersey specifically to pull him out of that hell , like the way my father took us out of the gangland hell of the South Bronx .
#Text=Like any father would do , to protect his family .
#Text=DS : Do you still feel the Iraq War is protecting us , and that the original reasons you supported it are still valid ?
#Text=Unlike many artists , I have vocally supported the war .
#Text=Many artists who support this war wo n't say that .
#Text=We have mutual respect for each other but we disagree on a lot of issues .
#Text=Nevertheless , there 's only one man I want fighting in the trenches of life with me , and that 's Ron Whitehead .
#Text=DS : When you look at the state of the world , what five descriptors come to mind ?
#Text=DS : Where do you get that hope from ?

#Text=DS : Joe Benigno said , " No one would question a poet writing about love for a woman , but when you ’re a fan of a team , the emotional attachment is even stronger , because women come and go , but your team never changes .
